short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snooze Gmail threads so they return to your inbox later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Snoozifier provides the ability to "snooze" an email thread so that it automatically returns to your inbox at a specified time. The benefit of this is that you can set a snooze time, then archive that thread so that the thread is out of your inbox until the snooze elapses. Although Gmail does provide built-in snooze functionality it is not as flexible as Snoozifier.

Snoozifier requires the following permissions:

★ View and modify but not delete your email - This is general access to Gmail and needed to snooze the messages. Snoozifier does not read or alter the contents of your emails.

★ View your calendars - This is needed to detect what timezone you are in so snoozed emails are woken at the correct time.

★ Connect to an external service - This is used to log statistics of how many people are using Snoozifier. No personal information is logged.

★ Allow this application to run when you are not present - This is needed to run the timers that check if snoozed emails need to be woken.
